title: Barasana Edurio (2010) New Testament
description: Edurio translation of the New Testament published by Wycliffe Bible Translators in 2010. Edurio is a minority language of Colombia.

language.name: Barasana-Eduria
language.area: Southern Vaupés region, Pira-Paraná River and tributaries. Jepa Matsi in Brazil may be dialect.
